Uses of Package
de.susebox.jtopas.spi

Packages that use de.susebox.jtopas.spi
de.susebox.jtopas   
de.susebox.jtopas.impl   
de.susebox.jtopas.spi   
 

Classes in de.susebox.jtopas.spi used by de.susebox.jtopas
DataMapper
           This interface declares the methods that a Tokenizer will call to detect the image and type of a token.
DataProvider
           This interface supplies the nessecary methods for a DataMapper or its subinterfaces (WhitespaceHandler, SeparatorHandler, PatternHandler KeywordHandler and SequenceHandler) to perform its operations like checking for whitespaces, special sequences etc.
KeywordHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a keyword handler for a Tokenizer.
PatternHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a pattern handler for a Tokenizer.
SeparatorHandler
           This interface declares the methods a Tokenizer needs to deal with separators.
SequenceHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a special sequence, string and comment start sequence checker for Tokenizer implementations.
WhitespaceHandler
           This interface declares the methods a Tokenizer needs to deal with whitespaces.
 

Classes in de.susebox.jtopas.spi used by de.susebox.jtopas.impl
PatternHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a pattern handler for a Tokenizer.
SequenceHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a special sequence, string and comment start sequence checker for Tokenizer implementations.
 

Classes in de.susebox.jtopas.spi used by de.susebox.jtopas.spi
KeywordHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a keyword handler for a Tokenizer.
PatternHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a pattern handler for a Tokenizer.
SeparatorHandler
           This interface declares the methods a Tokenizer needs to deal with separators.
SequenceHandler
           This interface must be implemented by classes that should be used as a special sequence, string and comment start sequence checker for Tokenizer implementations.

           This interface declares the methods a Tokenizer needs to deal with whitespaces.
